scenario.sendMessageSIP:
INVITE sip:[inviteeName1]@[107_DOMAIN_ADDR] SIP/2.0 To: "[inviteeName1]" <sip:[inviteeName1]@[107_DOMAIN_ADDR]> From: "[clientName]"<sip:[clientName]@[107_DOMAIN_ADDR]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localSIP];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId];id=[clientName] Call-ID: [newCallId] CSeq: [newCSeqNumber] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH Contact: <sip:[clientName]@[localSIP]> Supported: 100rel User-Agent: IMSLoader Session-Expires: 3600 Route: <sip:[remoteSIP];lr;call=orig> Route: <sip:ptt@[localSIP];lr> Content-Length: x Content-Type: application/sdp
